description: office furniture purchase for Ottawa, ON
full_summary:
Tender Announcement: EP076-232123 
####English Description
**Tender Reference**: WS4013670296/Doc4013925470
**Solicitation**: WS4013670296
**Tender Publication Date**: May 17, 2023
**Tender Close Date**: June 6, 2023 2:00 PM
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
**Trade Agreements**: None

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting tenders for the purchase of office furniture, equipment and installation services for Ottawa, ON. 

**Detailed Description**: 
This tender is part of the General Stream from product categories 1-6 and does not require an existing supply arrangement. The expected delivery and installation period for the ordered products is September 4, 2023 to October 2, 2023. 

**Security Requirements**:
The required products must comply with government security requirements. Suppliers must be able to verify the use of Requested Accordingly compliant products in the order to deliver necessary NFE documentation to PSPC.

**Point of Contact**:
Name: Nancy Sell
Email: nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: [ not available ] 

**Required Documents**: 
All tender documentation can be downloaded on the SAP Ariba platform.

Please note that tenders are only accepted in English or French. Suppliers can be assessed under Trade Agreement requirements. Suppliers requiring any additional information about this Document should contact the PSPC help desk.

---
